DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Use effect at current #yIndex #yValue, then increment it by #b1. #yIndex #yValue can not exceed #b4 (unless otherwise specified).
The number on your #yIndex power. If you don't have an index power, #yIndex #yValue is #b0.
At the end of your turn, gain block. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces #yPlated #yArmor by #b1... I think (yeah - definitely a feature and not a bug)
Boiling creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Boiling increments #b1.
